channel.title: CVE Feed for OFFIS -- DCMTK
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OFFIS -- DCMTK

item.title: CVE-2022-2121|2024-09-17T03:58:59.394Z -- offis -- dcmtk
item.description: OFFIS DCMTK's (All versions prior to 3.6.7) has a NULL pointer dereference vulnerability while processing DICOM files, which may result in a denial-of-service condition.

item.title: CVE-2022-2120|2024-09-17T02:11:57.645Z -- offis -- dcmtk
item.description: OFFIS DCMTK's (All versions prior to 3.6.7) service class user (SCU) is vulnerable to relative path traversal, allowing an attacker to write DICOM files into arbitrary directories under controlled names. This could allow remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-28130|2024-04-23T17:00:06.883Z -- offis -- dcmtk
item.description: An incorrect type conversion vulnerability exists in the DVPSSoftcopyVOI_PList::createFromImage functionality of OFFIS DCMTK 3.6.8. A specially crafted malformed file can lead to arbitrary code execution. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-28130|2024-06-04T18:03:51.021Z -- offis -- dcmtk
item.description: An incorrect type conversion vulnerability exists in the DVPSSoftcopyVOI_PList::createFromImage functionality of OFFIS DCMTK 3.6.8. A specially crafted malformed file can lead to arbitrary code execution. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-28130|2024-08-02T00:48:49.150Z -- offis -- dcmtk
item.description: An incorrect type conversion vulnerability exists in the DVPSSoftcopyVOI_PList::createFromImage functionality of OFFIS DCMTK 3.6.8. A specially crafted malformed file can lead to arbitrary code execution. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.
